bibl.title: The Landscape: Portrait of the Fayum.
bibl.note: Geographical features. - The stabilized rural landscape: Water management and landscape modifications; - Rural architectures as time capsule. - The faces of the desert. - Panoramic features.
bibl.seg: Francesca Veronica Rubattu, The Landscape: Portrait of the Fayum.
Geographical features. - The stabilized rural landscape: Water management and landscape modifications; - Rural architectures as time capsule. - The faces of the desert. - Panoramic features.
